author: Special Correspondent
text:
Upgam, a data and analytics company, will organise Hackfest 2016 at its offices at Thane and Coimbatore on March 31.

According to a press release from the company, the event will be a problem-solving contest for 24 hours and will involve analysts at its offices in India, the U.S. and the U.K. Teams will collaborate on a working-client problem to arrive at the accurate solution.

- Special Correspondent
title: Hackfest 2016
